title: Women making a big bang in science – 20 October 2015 (Statistics New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Statistics New Zealand ) The representation of women working in life science professions doubled between 1991 and 2013, according to a new report released today by Statistics NZ. Life science professions include fields such as
